title: 3 Bedroom 1 Bath Twin House for Rent
description:
Stunning Twin in Ardmore Park! This beautifully renovated home offers classic character with all the modern amenities & styling that very few homes achieve. Renovated from top to bottom, you'll walk up noticing the painted exterior & front porch, ideal for evenings on a rocking chair.  Entering the home, refinished hardwood floors lead you through a living rm w/ gas fireplace, formal dining room & renovated cut away kitchen with granite countertops w/ breakfast bar that includes updated cabinetry, lighting, stainless steel appliances & a tile floor. To add to the great space, an incredible deck (22' x 15') wraps both the side and back of the home creating a great outdoor living area & entertaining space. Upstairs offers 3 bedrooms, including a master bedroom w/ plenty of closet space, and a full hall bath. The walk out partial basement provides great storage, on-site laundry and additional storage in the 1 car attached garage (with built In shelving). Close to area colleges, walking distance to commuter train station & Merion Golf Club (future site of the US OPEN).  With CENTRAL AIR, Replacement Windows, Deck, Kitchen, Porch, & Driveway, move right in!

title: Perfect 1 bedroom furnished, affordable, short term rental
description:

This home features a galley kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances, a washer/dryer, wood floors throughout the condo, and a marble bathroom. ParcRittenhouse has an outdoor swimming pool, newly refurbished common areas, fitness room, and a 24/7 desk person/concierge. title: Welcome to Byrne Lofts one of Phoenixville's coolest pieces of history
description: Welcome to Byrne Lofts, one of Phoenixville's coolest pieces of history. This circa 1895 Corset Mill was converted into 32 unique loft-style units in the heart of downtown Phoenixville. This is your opportunity to live in this Unit #111 in one of the best locations on the main floor close to the gym, the main entrance with mail/package room, and just steps to the exit to your personal deeded parking spot #32 (which includes an electric outlet if you need a car charging station). Lots of character with original hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large double pane windows for lots of light throughout the day, and black-out shutters for the evening. Open floor plan is perfect for entertaining friends, the beautiful kitchen features Granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, upgraded cabinets, and a large island. This one-bedroom unit features an upgraded tiled bathroom, and washer and dryer in the unit. Don't miss the large storage cabinet offering room for lots of boxes, bins, skis, etc. The secure building includes a fitness center, places to hang and lock your bike inside, community room, and an outdoor community deck. Phoenixville is located at the junction of French Creek and the Schuylkill River, offering many outdoor activities including biking/walking path and boat launch. Downtown offers 10 craft breweries, one distillery, plus numerous restaurants, shops, Colonial Theatre, and farmers market. Close to King of Prussia Mall, Valley Forge Park, and Providence Town Center and Routes 422, 202, 76 & 276.

title: Stunning 3-Bedroom Townhouse in Graduate Hospital! Available NOW!
description:
This stunning 3-Bedroom/1.5-Bathroom Townhouse is located just off of 25th and Christian in the Graduate Hospital neighborhood of Philadelphia! Surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants, and shopping, you couldn't ask for a better location! Easy access to public transportation and other great neighborhoods like Fitler Square and Rittenhouse Square. This property is available now and is not one you want to miss out on!
Entry into the home leads you into the living room which is complete with wide-plank flooring, tall ceilings, and a large window which allows plenty of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly bright and open! There is an unobstructed sight line from the front of the house all the way into the kitchen which creates an open concept and is perfect for when you're entertaining guests or hosting holidays!
The dining room can accommodate a six-seat dining set with ease and is completely open into the kitchen which makes serving meals a breeze. The kitchen is beautiful and includes light oak cabinets and black appliances. There is a refrigerator, four-burner gas range, and dishwasher all included - no need to wash your dishes by hand! There is also a ceiling fan included which is perfect for air circulation as well as central A/C!
All three bedrooms are on the second floor of the home and are a comfortable size. They include more wide-plank flooring, ceiling fans, and ample closet space. They also include large windows which allow even more natural light to pour into the home! The full bathroom is located in the hallway and is easily accessible from all three bedrooms. It includes stone tile flooring, vanity, and a full-sized bathtub/shower with a tile surround and glass doors!
In addition to all of the great features throughout the home, there is also a back patio which is the perfect spot for outdoor relaxation, entertaining friends, and grilling! There is an unfinished basement as well with a full sized washer and dryer which can be used for additional storage.
Tenants are responsible for electric, gas, water, and cable/internet in addition to rent each month. Small dogs welcome with an additional deposit and monthly pet fee!

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

title: This Spacious Bi-level Apartment Incredible Location!
description:
This spacious bi-level apartment checks all of the boxes... hardwood floors, central heat/AC, gas cooking, dishwasher, in-unit laundry, outdoor space, and an incredible location! In fact, this location has a Walk Score of 98, surrounded by some of the city's best coffee shops/brunch spots (Shot Tower Coffee, Fitzwater Cafe, etc) and neighborhood favorites new and old such as Fitz on 4th, Saloon Restaurant, & Little Fish. Inside the apartment you'll enjoy the top two floors (2nd/3rd) of the building, so no one living above you. The massive living room with exposed brick walls, 1/2 bathroom, laundry, and kitchen/dining area are all located on the 2nd floor. Off of the kitchen/dining room you can enjoy the first of two decks, convenient for grilling and outdoor dining. On the top floor there is a full bathroom and 3 spacious bedrooms, all with full closets. The rear bedroom also has a sliding door which leads out to your 2nd private deck. Property is vacant and can be scheduled on short notice!
762 S 5th St

title: Charming 2-bed Unit condominium in Center City!
description:
Gorgeous bi-level condominium in Center City! The home features a contemporary eat-in kitchen (granite countertops, stainless steel appliances) on the main level, along with a bedroom and full bathroom. Downstairs, you'll find the living room, as well as another bedroom and a full bathroom with a tub. Enjoy central air, in-unit laundry, walk-in closets, a dishwasher, and hardwood floors throughout. The south-facing windows provide lots of light. Short walk to Rittenhouse Square, Broad Street Subway, and dozens of restaurants/shops.
1343 Lombard St #A

description:

This home features a modern and updated living space with a large window, an island kitchen with stainless steel appliances and private access to a small balcony area, and a spacious lower level bedroom with a huge closet and en suite bathroom. This apartment is a couple of blocks from the new Giant, Retro Fitness, BSL Station, and plenty more.

description:

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with City View on Rittenhouse Square
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, Tselaine, Bella Turka, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Bottega Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Bluestone Lane, Konditori, Di Bruno Bros., Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Le Pain Quotidien. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with beautiful lobby
* 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance
* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 10th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large north-facing windows
* City skyline view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 1006 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!

title: Beautiful one bedroom, one bath home at the Ellington!
description:
WELCOME HOME to this beautiful one bedroom, one bath home at the Ellington! The living and dining areas offer dramatic ten foot high ceilings, Brazilian cherry hardwood floors, and oversized windows that fill the home with natural light. The kitchen with breakfast bar features Poggenpohl cabinets, stainless steel appliances, Kohler fixtures, and Capao Bonito granite countertops. The bedroom features a double door closet and is set across from the spacious spa-like bathroom, which boasts White Gioia marble tile flooring, chrome fixtures, and a ceramic sink with storage vanity. Included in the rent are central air and heating, water and sewer, 24 hour concierge, private fitness center, and club room. Valet parking is available next door in a public garage. Perfectly situated in the Rittenhouse and Avenue of the Arts area, this home is steps away from fine dining, one-of-a kind shopping, world-renowned cultural destinations and exciting nightlife. APARTMENT ALSO AVAILABLE PARTIALLY FURNISHED AT NO ADDITIONAL COST. ** Photos from another unit with identical floorplan

title: Enjoy the best of city life, steps from various museums!
description:
Live in Logan Square, a Philadelphia neighborhood steeped in art and culture. Enjoy the best of city life, steps from various museums, parks, restaurants, and other conveniences. Just minutes from the Schuylkill River trail, I-76, and Market St transportation west to Chop and the universities and east to City Hall and beyond. Unit #803 is a sun-filled open concept 1-bedroom unit facing west towards the river. Features include warm-tone laminate wood flooring throughout and a custom built modern kitchen with high-end appliances, peninsula island, and walk-in pantry. The bedroom fits a King-bed comfortably and includes a large closet with custom shelving. In-unit laundry is located next to a modern bathroom with tub. Last but not least, one storage locker is provided for added convenience. This building has several parking options within walking distance. Tenant pays electric; water included in rent. One pet under 30lbs permitted at landlord's discretion. Live in the center of it all and experience Philadelphia as it's truly meant to be. Schedule your appointment today!
2201 Cherry St #803

title: Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, City Skyline View, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 2107 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 21st floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, Tselaine, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Ritual Shoppe, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Coco Blue Spruce. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Monk's Cafe, The Continental Mid-town, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Konditori, or Elixr. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
